glmdisc 0.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

Obtaining the cutpoints and / or regroupments of a discretization.

cutpoints-method.Rd

This defines the generic method "cutpoints" which will provide the cutpoints of a discretization scheme of S4 class glmdisc.

This defines the method to provide the cutpoints of a trained glmdisc.

Arguments

glmdisc

The trained glmdisc S4 object.

Examples

# Simulation of a discretized logit model
set.seed(1)
x = matrix(runif(300), nrow = 100, ncol = 3)
cuts = seq(0,1,length.out= 4)
xd = apply(x,2, function(col) as.numeric(cut(col,cuts)))
theta = t(matrix(c(0,0,0,2,2,2,-2,-2,-2),ncol=3,nrow=3))
log_odd = rowSums(t(sapply(seq_along(xd[,1]), function(row_id) sapply(seq_along(xd[row_id,]),
function(element) theta[xd[row_id,element],element]))))
y = rbinom(100,1,1/(1+exp(-log_odd)))

sem_disc <- glmdisc(x,y,iter=50,m_start=4,test=FALSE,validation=FALSE,criterion="aic")
